author: ate
msg: Added javadoc clarification that the lists of principals or names retrieved through the JetspeedPrincipalManager are modifiable and detached.
Which means these lists can be used and modified at will, no need to copy them into another list.

author: hansbak
msg: correct menu highlight, remove invoice status list button, info already on overview and nothing can be modified anyway

author: psmith
msg: Add a menu item that allows the user to copy the currently displayed events to the System clipboard in a reasonable good human-readable format.
Quite good for QA people to paste into an issue tracker.

author: mor
msg: Misc UI enhancements. Contribution from Rishi Solanki.

author: qiuxx
msg: Apply for HARMONY-5974, ([classlib] [beans] XMLEncoderTest.assertCodedXML(Object obj, String xmlFile,ByteArrayOutputStream temp, XMLEncoder enc) should be modified)
